name: 人品大冒险
description:
Game introduction


This is a casual game through. The player controls the protagonist to find the door to the next level. There are a lot of obstacles and traps, and it takes a lot of manipulation or luck to get through them. Clever level design and difficult traps require multiple explorations to find hidden traps. Use your European energy and enter the door of the next level.

Game Features


  • A large number of traps

    There are so many traps in the map that you never know how many traps are waiting to be triggered



  • Completely random trap triggering mechanism

    Now comes the test of character!

    A large number of traps will be triggered randomly, resulting in a different route for each pass, greatly increasing the difficulty of the game and the level of torture



  • Infinite Resurrection mechanism

    The card can be infinite resurrection, until the end of the clearance!
